name: Senior System Analyst (Relocation to Bangkok)
description: Responsibilities:  Design new IT solutions, modify, enhance or adapt existing systems and integrate new features or improvements. Create the following documentation: Requirements documents, Feasibility studies, Design specifications, Flowcharts and diagrams, Training documents, Testing documents, Disaster recovery plans (DRPs). Analyse systems requirements, examine existing IT systems and business models. Implement, configure and test feasible solutions. Specify and shape the system requirements and operations, the user interface and output and present the proposal to the stakeholders. Work closely with the client team, including commercial managers and software developers, during both the report and implementation phase.  Requirements:  Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field. At least 5 years of experience on related field. Good knowledge of UML, requirements gathering and analysis. Possess a clear understanding of the software development life cycle. Good knowledge of OOP and systems integration. Strong experience on database driven Web applications. Good understanding of scope management and Work Breakdown Structure (WBS). Strong English communication skills both spoken and written  Benefit Package:  Air ticket plus reasonable personal effects to take up the position  Visa & Work permit provided upon passing probation. Health, Accident & Life Insurance  Annual Health Check-up (after probation period). Dental Allowance as per company policy (after probation period). Provident Fund (after probation period). Government Social Security Fund Distribution as required by Thai law. Actual expense reimbursement on relevant professional activities. Annual Leave and other leaves as per the Company’s policy.  ​​​​​
